name: Portfolio
description_en: This is my portfolio on github

name: Task-list Flutter
description_en: Learning dart&flutter and built this project using tutorials, this will be used as reference for future projects.
description_fr: Learning dart&flutter and built this project using tutorials, this will be used as reference for future projects.
description_ru: Learning dart&flutter and built this project using tutorials, this will be used as reference for future projects.

name: LED snake game
description_en: Developed a game using RaspberryPi 3, 16x16 WS2812B LED, Xbox controller and Pyhton.
description_fr: Développer un jeu en utilisant RaspberryPi 3, 16x16 WS2812B LED, contrôleur Xbox et Python.
description_ru: Разработал игру с использованием RaspberryPi 3, 16x16 WS2812B LED, контроллера Xbox и Python.

name: Status shell script
description_en: A small script that checks the status of repository in its current location.
description_fr: Un script qui vérifie l'état des 'repository' dans le dossier actuel
description_ru: Небольшой скрипт, который проверяет статус 'repository' в его текущем местоположении.

name: Voice Sandbox
description_en: Created a GUI for annyang voice commands so that I can test out voice commands.
description_fr: Created a GUI for annyang voice commands so that I can test out voice commands.
description_ru: Created a GUI for annyang voice commands so that I can test out voice commands.

name: Grocery-list Flutter
description_en: A flutter app to track your grocery to-buy list. Another learning flutter app similar structure to my task list flutter app but with additional personal features added.
description_fr: A flutter app to track your grocery to-buy list. Another learning flutter app similar structure to my task list flutter app but with additional personal features added.
description_ru: A flutter app to track your grocery to-buy list. Another learning flutter app similar structure to my task list flutter app but with additional personal features added.

name: Code Collab
description_en: A NodeJS project that allows you to 'live' work/share your code with your team using SocketIO
description_fr: Un projet NodeJS qui vous permet de partager voter code en 'temps réel' avec votre équipe en utilisant SocketIO
description_ru: Проект с использованием NodeJS, который позволяет в реальном времени работать или делиться своим кодом с вашей командой, используя SocketIO

name: Login page
description_en: A NodeJS project, this is just a quick refresher/practice at home
description_fr: Un projet NodeJS, c'est un 'repository' de pratique
